scripts.anchor:test: cd anchor && mkdir -p .anchor && (test -f .anchor/test-wallet.json || solana-keygen new --no-bip39-passphrase -s -o .anchor/test-wallet.json) && anchor test --provider.cluster localnet --provider.wallet ./.anchor/test-wallet.json
